channel.title: Lanyards
channel.description: I have a collection of Lanyards going, and I'm needing a couple for my collection. I can't seem to find one, but I know they have to exist. I'm looking for a Call of Duty 4 Lanyard, and a Modern Warfare 2 Lanyard.

item.title: Lanyards
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I don’t collect rocks anymore, I did when I was like 7 though.

I collect knifes, guns, arrow heads, and human skulls O.O

Read full topic

item.title: Lanyards
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:16, topic:302129”]what the hell is a lanyard

for some reason cuz it was game related i assumed it was gonna be the display boxes they do when a game is new

i was going to point out that a cooler thing to own would be the lifesized orcs they had in stores for the WoW release back in the day

man i want one of those orcs[/quote]
Lanyard:

For your orc dilemma, http://www.coolminiornot.com/forums/viewthread.php?tid=34505&fid=14

020309_orc_1.jpg450×600

i think maybe thats what you mean but i don’t know

Read full topic

item.title: Lanyards
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:12, topic:302129”][quote author=Elijah link=topic=398457.msg2957013#msg2957013 date=1252888043]

To hang yourself with?

?

No, to collect… Don’t you have a collection of some sort? Maybe as a child you collected baseball cards or something?
[/quote]

Sorry, I just thought it was a funny collection. Yes I collect stuff too, cars, guns, coins and rocks.[/quote]

You collect rocks and you’re gonna crack a joke about my collection? At least mine serve a purpose! It’s cool though, it’s kind of weird to collect things in the first place. Much less a strange item like a lanyard.

Read full topic
